public boolean setImage(java.lang.String imageName)
Takes the name name of an image that is expected to exist on the local file system and tests if it is there.

Parameters:
imageName - name of the image you expect to find.
Returns:

public boolean isSuccessful()
If you are looking to see if an already downloaded image is available for inclusion into the notes use setImage(String).

Returns:
True if the download of the image was successful, and false otherwise.
